page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.MULTI_SELECT() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.MULTI_SELECT() Description The &ltOBJECT>.MULTI_SELECT() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.MULTI_SELECT() method displays the Multi-Select Records dialog box.
Limitations Desktop applications only. Example dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.multi_select()
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
